bullet_points: Developed scalable web applications using Python and Django.
Optimized database queries, improving performance by 30 percent.

Led a team of three engineers in developing a critical feature.
Improved codebase maintainability by introducing linting and CI/CD pipelines.
Performed code reviews and mentored junior engineers.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver key milestones.
Integrated third-party services to extend product capabilities.

Received company recognition for exceptional contribution to project timelines.
Analyzed large datasets using Python and SQL to identify trends.
Automated reporting processes, reducing manual workload by 50 percent.
Created dashboards in Tableau for real-time business insights.
Cleaned and preprocessed data for machine learning models.
Designed experiments to validate hypotheses and drove decision-making.

Presented findings to stakeholders, influencing strategic plans.

projects.skills: Python, Machine Learning, TensorFlow, SQL, Tableau, AWS
projects.description: Developed an AI-driven platform that provides real-time customer insights by analyzing large volumes of transactional and behavioral data. Designed and implemented machine learning models to predict customer churn, recommend personalized products, and optimize marketing campaigns. Leveraged TensorFlow and Python for model training, SQL for data preprocessing, and Tableau for dynamic visualization dashboards. Scaled the platform using AWS services such as S3 for storage and Lambda for serverless processing, ensuring 99.9% uptime. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define product requirements and conducted A/B testing to validate model effectiveness, increasing campaign ROI by 25%.

projects.skills: OpenCV, Python, Flask, React, Docker, Kubernetes
projects.description: Engineered a real-time video analytics system for traffic management that detects and classifies vehicles using OpenCV and Python. Designed a microservices architecture with Flask for backend API development and React for a responsive frontend interface. Integrated Docker for containerization and Kubernetes for scalable deployment. The system processes video streams, identifies traffic patterns, and generates actionable reports. Optimized computational performance through algorithm improvements, achieving a 40% reduction in processing time. Conducted rigorous testing to ensure high accuracy, contributing to improved traffic flow and reduced congestion in pilot tests.

projects.skills: Python, Spark, Hadoop, NLP, REST APIs
projects.description: Built a recommendation engine for an e-commerce platform to suggest products based on user preferences and browsing history. Utilized Spark and Hadoop for distributed data processing and scalability. Incorporated natural language processing (NLP) techniques to analyze user reviews and extract sentiment scores. Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to integrate the engine with the platformâ€™s user interface. Collaborated with stakeholders to fine-tune algorithms, improving recommendation relevance by 30%. Documented the system architecture and provided detailed deployment instructions to ensure seamless integration with existing infrastructure.

projects.skills: JavaScript, D3.js, HTML, CSS, Node.js, MongoDB
projects.description: Designed and developed an interactive data visualization tool that allows users to explore complex datasets with ease. Used D3.js for dynamic and aesthetically pleasing visualizations, including heatmaps, scatter plots, and hierarchical tree maps. Built the backend using Node.js and MongoDB to handle data storage and retrieval efficiently. Ensured responsiveness and cross-platform compatibility using HTML and CSS. Implemented user authentication and role-based access control to secure the tool. Gathered user feedback to iterate on designs, leading to a 95% satisfaction rate in usability surveys.

projects.skills: C++, Arduino, Raspberry Pi, MQTT, AWS IoT Core
projects.description: Developed a smart home system that integrates IoT devices to automate and enhance home management. Programmed Arduino and Raspberry Pi devices for sensor data collection and actuator control. Used MQTT protocol to enable secure communication between devices and AWS IoT Core for centralized data management and analytics. Created a companion mobile app to allow users to monitor and control devices remotely. Designed custom firmware to ensure efficient power consumption and seamless device interoperability. The system was deployed in a prototype smart home, demonstrating features such as automated lighting, climate control, and security alerts.
